description:
For those of us who demand greatness every time we hit the slopes, the Superguide 95 gives you what you need. When conditions are changing, this ski unleashes awesomeness on every run. Carbon sidewall construction reinforces their sporty feel without compromising grip or stability. A Paulownia and Beech core dampens to create a powerful ski when you're charging, while keeping things agile through the trees. Pro Tip Rocker uses a progressive tip so you can play all day and make the most of the mountain.

  • Paulownia and Beech Wood Core keeps the ski light, lively and stable
  • Pro Tip Rocker 320 make it turn-friendly and allow for a stiffer flex set-up
  • Full Length Carbon Fiber laminate adds durability and power
  • 3Dimension Touring sidecut makes initiating turns easier is a variety of conditions
  • Carbon Sandwich Sidewall construction for torsion and flex control
  • Scott Hook Skin Fixation System allows for easy skin attachment
  • Sintered base gives exceptional glide and durability
name: Scott Superguide 95 Skis - Women's
